entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and 70 percent chance of rain showers before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
